source_text: This world is filled with all sorts of resources, this I have known for a long time... But today I have made a new discovery, there is an ore in this world, with a somewhat dark shine to it, it makes me think of precious gems, but I sense a very obscure presence within them. I seem to find them mostly around the same places as &lRedstone Ore&r, but sometimes also much higher. Hitting them with an iron pick axe seems to be the minimal requirement to get some of these gems. There also seems to appear some kind of rather strange dust, but only when I mine them while experiencing Fortune. I’m sure I will find a use for this dust soon enough. It appears that higher Fortune levels increase the chance of getting these dusts.

source_text: It seems that there are some new creatures in this world. This creature appears to be a pretty large type of dragonfly. During the daytime it is a rather peaceful creature, but do not be fooled, for if you would venture too close in proximity of this insect, it will try to poison you as though it being some kind of self defense. At night however, this beasty becomes subdued by an ancient evil and kills everything in its path. I deem myself lucky they have no other weapons besides actively looking me up at night to come and poison me. I managed to kill quite a few of these annoying things and carved some interesting poison sacs from their bodies. I have thrown them in a &1Bucket of Water&0 and the water really absorbs the poison well when I throw in four of these. I have long done the same with &lPoisonous Potato’s&r as well. It can be useful in a pinch for defending my evil lair... Ehm, I mean house... I named this creature after the Dutch word for it’s kind, because I did not want to let it be confused with ordinary dragon flies, for obvious reasons...
target_text: この世界には新しい生き物がいるようです。この生き物は非常に大きなトンボのように見えます。昼間はかなり平和的な生き物ですが、油断はできません。この昆虫の近くに近づきすぎると、自己防衛として毒を与えようとします。しかし夜間になると、この獣は古い悪意に支配され、その道のすべてを殺します。幸い彼らは夜間に私を狙って毒を与える以外の武器を持っていません。これらの煩わしい生き物をかなり倒すことができて、その体から興味深い毒嚢を刻み出しました。それを水の樽に入れ、4つを投げ込むと水が毒をよく吸収します。長い間、毒性ジャガイモでも同じことをしていました。それは邪悪な隠れ場所...いや、家を守るのに役立つことができます...私はこの生き物にオランダ語の名前を付けました。通常のトンボと混同されたくなかったからです。

source_text: Whilst I was exploring this world, I have taken rest in many villages. One of the towns I rested in had a strange looking fellow in it. I started talking to him and it soon struck me he was not as interested in emeralds as the other people in his town. In fact he started asking more and more questions about the dark ore I had discovered, we talked away hours and hours. source_text: Some people seem to have "&oToo Many Items&r", while others have "&oNot Enough Items&r". It seems like we finally reached a stage where people have "&oJust Enough Items&r", the knowledge from this book is understandable for them.
target_text: 何人かの人は「アイテムが多すぎる」と言い、他の人は「アイテムが足りない」と言います。私たちはついに「ちょうどいい量のアイテム」を持つ段階に達したようで、この本の知識は彼らにとって理解可能なものになっているようです。

source_text: I have noticed Thaumaturgy to be a very different kind of magic. It looks like Thaumaturges are very happy when they see items of mine, they always walk around here with their strange hexagons. To please my friends, I have constructed some &1Veined Scribing Tools&0 which can be used to write with &4Blood&0 instead of ink.
target_text: タウマトゥルジーは非常に異なる種類の魔法であることに気付きました。タウマトゥルグたちは私のアイテムを見るとき非常に幸せなようで、彼らはいつも奇妙な六角形を持って歩き回っています。友人たちを喜ばせるために、インクの代わりに血液で書くために使用できる脈動スクライブツールをいくつか構築しました。

source_text: These people are quite strange, they always wear very odd clothes and mostly seem to be wielding many types of wrenches for some reason. I know only one thing about them, they have a machine that can transpose fluids which allows for some very basic blood infusion, but unfortunately this can't be upgraded.
target_text: これらの人々はかなり奇妙で、常に非常に奇妙な服を着ており、ほとんどの場合、何らかの理由で多くのレンチを使用しているようです。彼らについて1つだけ知っています。彼らは流体を転置できるマシンを持っており、これは非常に基本的な血液注入を可能にしますが、残念ながら、これはアップグレードできません。
